thread.title: Gareth Gates and Faye Brookes admit they're feeling broody and are "definitely going to get married and have babies"
thread.title_full: Gareth Gates and Faye Brookes admit they're feeling broody and are "definitely going to get married and have babies"

author: Vicki Newman
title: Gareth Gates and Faye Brookes admit they're feeling broody and are "definitely going to get married and have babies"
text:
Gareth Gates and Faye Brookes admit they're feeling broody and are "definitely going to get married and have babies" The couple have just enjoyed a romantic trip to Paris together Share Gareth Gates and Faye Brookes have big plans for the future (Photo: OK) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Gareth Gates and Faye Brookes admit they're starting to feel broody and definitely want babies. 
The couple have just enjoyed a romantic trip to Paris together, and it seems it's got them in the mood for thinking about the future. 
They've said they're "definitely" going to get married and have babies - but they're not quite there just yet. 
The couple, who have been together for four and half years after meeting when they played the lead roles in Legally Blonde the Musical back in 2012, spoke to OK! magazine about their future. Read More Gareth Gates and Faye Brookes are feeling broody (Photo: WENN) They want to get married and have babies (Photo: OK) 
Coronation Street star Faye said: "Gareth’s Valentine’s card made me cry like a baby as he wrote some beautiful words in it about how much he loves me. 
"Gareth’s the one person I let my hair down with as I like to be in control, and I’m the one who keeps him in check!" 
On making it work long-distance, the actress explained: "If I’m fortunate to get a few days off, I’ll just travel to wherever in the country Gareth is. It’s been like that since we met. We just spend any spare time we have together to make it work. 
"Our relationship’s always fiery because there’s so much love there and so much passion." They talk about their plans in this week's OK! (Photo: OK) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
